ingredients: 6 sliced Texas toast or thick cut bread, 2 large eggs,1/4 cup milk or cream, 1 tsp sugar, 1/4 tsp cinnamon,pinch of salt,splash of vanilla extract,butter and vegetable oil for cooking

2 cups cooked quinoa, ½ cup chopped scallions,¼ cup fresh chopped mint, ½ cup fresh chopped parsley, 1 cup Persian cucumbers, chopped, 1 cup garbanzo beans, 2 cloves of minced garlic, ¼ cup fresh squeezed lemon juice,3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil,1 large tomato, diced, 2 oz crumbled feta cheese,Salt and pepper to taste
White Onion, Tomato, Fresh Green Coriander, Hot Green Chillies, Garam Masala, Ground Black Pepper, Red Chilly Powder, Rapeseed Oil, Egg.Salt

1 & 1/2 Cup all purpose flour (maida), 1 Tbsp baking powder, 1/4 Tsp baking soda, 1/4 Cup powdered sugar, A pinch of salt, 1 & 1/4 Cup Warm milk (add a little more if needed), 2 Tbsp butter, Some watermelon to serve with the pancakes, Some honey or maple syrup

220 g (8 ounces) conchiglie, or any other shell-shaped pasta, 2 tbsp olive oil, pinch of salt, 1/2 medium onion 450 g (1 pound) extra lean ground beef, 2 cloves garlic, 450 g (2 cups) tomato sauce, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1/2 tsp Dijon mustard, 1/4 tsp Italian seasoning, 120 ml (1/2 cup) heavy / whipping cream , Basil (optional), Salt & pepper to taste, Parmigiano-Reggiano (optional) , Dijon mustard (optional but recommended for building layers of flavor)
